item.title: 随着亏损和债务的增加，中国大型养猪企业纷纷进军
item.description:
The biggest pig breeders in China, consumer of fully half the world's pork, seem to have bitten off more than they can chew.翻译:中国最大的养猪企业消耗了全球一半的猪肉，但它们似乎已经吃不消了。

Big agribusinesses have elbowed their way into the sector and are rapidly modernising it, but have expanded pig herds so aggressively that, with demand now in a downturn, their hog prices are falling, losses are mounting, and debt is rising.翻译:大型农业综合企业纷纷涌入该行业，并迅速实现现代化，但其生猪存栏规模却过于激进，在需求低迷的情况下，它们的生猪价格不断下跌，损失不断增加，债务不断增加。

More huge losses are expected next year, putting China's pig enterprises under pressure to slim down their breeding herds and sell off farms, many of which are sitting empty.翻译:预计明年将出现更多巨额亏损，这将使中国养猪企业面临减少种猪存栏和出售养殖场的压力，其中许多养殖场已空置。

For now, however, they are digging in, hoping to wait out the market downturn and reap a bonanza when prices eventually recover. And that is raising the stakes, not just for themselves but for their overseas feed suppliers, genetics firms, and the struggling global pork trade.翻译:然而，目前他们正在深耕，希望等待市场低迷结束，并在价格最终回升时收获丰厚的回报。这不仅增加了他们自己的风险，也增加了他们的海外饲料供应商、基因公司和陷入困境的全球猪肉贸易的风险。

"It all comes down to how deep these companies' pockets are," said Lyle Jones, China sales director at U.S.-based Genesus Inc, which supplies breeding pigs to the leading producers.翻译:“这一切都取决于这些公司的财力有多雄厚，”美国加裕公司中国销售总监莱尔琼斯说，该公司向领先的生产商供应种猪。

Hog farming, like other Chinese sectors from homebuilding to electric vehicles, has in recent years prioritised growth and market share over profits, creating a surplus that has driven pig prices lower and is now crowding out imports.翻译:与从住宅建筑到电动汽车等中国其他行业一样，生猪养殖近年来将增长和市场份额置于利润之上，造成的盈余导致生猪价格下跌，目前正在挤出进口。

China's cash hog prices have averaged well below even the most efficient producers' costs this year, for the first time in nearly a decade, and in the past three months alone have dropped 15% to 14.5 yuan per kilogram.翻译:今年，中国的生猪现金平均价格甚至远低于最高效生产者的成本，这是近十年来的首次，并且仅在过去三个月就下跌了15%，至每公斤14.5元。

The most-active live hog futures on the Dalian Commodity Exchange have tumbled 7.3% since the beginning of last week to 13,910 yuan ($1,949) per metric ton, the lowest since they began trading almost three years ago.翻译:大连商品交易所最活跃的生猪期货自上周初以来已下跌 7.3%，至每吨 13,910 元人民币（1,949 美元），为近三年前开始交易以来的最低水平。

The downdraft has defied both state efforts to prop up prices with token purchases for official reserves, and the start of the peak winter season for pork consumption.翻译:国家通过象征性购买官方储备来提振价格的努力，以及冬季猪肉消费旺季的开始，都无视了这种下行趋势。

And it is squeezing a number of big producers in the $200 billion-a-year industry, with the top 10 producers alone recording a 13% increase in net debt this year as of end-September, according to state-run media.翻译:据官方媒体报道，这一年产值达 2000 亿美元的行业中的一些大型生产商受到挤压，截至 9 月底，仅前 10 名生产商的净债务就增加了 13%。

New Hope Liuhe (000876.SZ), China's third-largest producer and the world's fifth largest, sold off farms last year and told investors in July it wanted to sell more, while bringing in strategic investors to its poultry and food units.翻译:中国第三大、全球第五大生产商新希望六和（000876.SZ）去年出售了农场，并于7月告诉投资者希望出售更多，同时为其家禽和食品业务引入战略投资者。

The company has made "some progress" on those fronts, it told investors on Friday, but gave no details. It also said a 7.35 billion yuan private share issue announced on Nov. 30 would help it to repay loans and rein in debt.翻译:该公司周五告诉投资者，在这些方面已经取得了“一些进展”，但没有透露细节。该公司还表示，11月30日宣布的73.5亿元非公开发行股票将有助于其偿还贷款和控制债务。

Major producers Tech-Bank (002124.SZ) and Fujian Aonong (603363.SS) have been selling off stakes in themselves or in subsidiaries to raise cash, while Aonong's debt-to-equity ratio reached a hefty 8.26 in the third quarter according to LSEG data. Neither company responded to requests for comment about their current challenges and working capital requirements.

EXPANDING DEBT

Jiangxi Zhengbang Technology (002157.SZ), which became China's second-largest producer after a rapid expansion drive, was forced into a restructuring last year despite support from local government-run firms.翻译:江西正邦科技（002157.SZ）经过快速扩张成为中国第二大生产商，尽管有地方政府企业的支持，但去年仍被迫进行重组。

Moreover, with debt levels swelling across the Chinese economy, banks and local governments have become less willing or able to offer support.翻译:此外，随着中国经济的债务水平不断膨胀，银行和地方政府提供支持的意愿或能力越来越低。

"Over the past two years, banks could lend them a lot so these companies expanded very fast," said an analyst at an equity research firm, who was not authorised to speak to the media and declined to be named.翻译:一家股票研究公司的分析师表示：“过去两年，银行可以向他们提供大量贷款，因此这些公司扩张得非常快。”该分析师未获授权接受媒体采访，但拒绝透露姓名。

But now, especially given the companies' high debt levels, the analyst said: "It's hard for them to borrow any money from the banks."翻译:但现在，特别是考虑到这些公司的高债务水平，分析师表示：“他们很难从银行借到任何钱。”

Analysts say the biggest players - industry leader Muyuan Foods Co , a low-cost producer and one of the few generating cashflow, and No. 2 Wens Foodstuff Group Co (300498.SZ), which has reduced costs significantly - may be well-positioned for a shake-out.翻译:分析师表示，最大的参与者——行业领先者牧原食品有限公司（一家低成本生产商，也是为数不多的产生现金流的公司之一）和排名第二的温氏食品集团有限公司（300498.SZ） ——成本大幅降低——可能处于有利地位。进行一次洗牌。

But challenges are mounting as China produces record volumes of pork, in part a legacy of past encouragement from Beijing, which fears food price volatility and urged a major expansion of sow herds after an African swine fever outbreak in the late 2010s killed half the country's pigs.翻译:但随着中国猪肉产量创历史新高，挑战也越来越大，这在一定程度上是北京过去鼓励政策的结果。北京担心食品价格波动，并在2010年代末非洲猪瘟爆发导致中国一半生猪死亡后敦促大幅扩大母猪存栏量。

Muyuan alone has more than tripled its sow herd since 2018, chasing after market share along with other big publicly listed firms, and now has three times as many sows as WH Group (0288.HK), which owns top U.S. producer Smithfield Foods.翻译:自2018年以来，仅牧原公司的母猪存栏量就增加了两倍多，与其他大型上市公司一起争夺市场份额，目前母猪数量是万洲国际（0288.HK）的三倍，后者拥有美国顶级生产商史密斯菲尔德食品公司。

Analysts at Hua'an Securities forecast that hog output would jump 10% in the first half of 2024. That follows a 17% surge in the first nine months of this year at China's 15 big market-listed breeders even as they reported 200 billion yuan in combined net losses.翻译:华安证券分析师预测，2024年上半年生猪产量将增长10%。今年前9个月，中国15家大型上市养殖企业的产值达2000亿元，但生猪产量仍增长17%。合并净亏损。

To make matters worse, pork consumption in China has been hit both by slowing economic growth and by diners' changing preferences, as more health-conscious consumers - especially young people and urbanites - switch to poultry and other foods.翻译:更糟糕的是，中国的猪肉消费受到经济增长放缓和食客偏好变化的打击，越来越多注重健康的消费者——尤其是年轻人和城市居民——转向家禽和其他食品。

And the costs of battling disease have risen substantially, with African swine fever now endemic and a constant threat to all farms.翻译:与疾病作斗争的成本大幅上升，非洲猪瘟现已流行，并持续威胁着所有农场。

China's agriculture ministry has warned of heavier losses for the sector in early 2024 than a year ago and urged pig producers to cut output.翻译:中国农业部警告称，2024年初该行业的损失将比一年前更严重，并敦促生猪生产者减产。

While the big producers have slashed spending on new equipment and taken other cost-cutting measures, most remain reluctant to unload idle farms and reduce breeding herds.翻译:尽管大型生产商已经削减了新设备的支出并采取了其他削减成本的措施，但大多数生产商仍然不愿意出售闲置农场并减少种猪群。

"Leading companies aggressively expanded in 2020-21, the capex was huge, and they're not willing to reduce capacity, even under the current weak price," said Flora Zhu, director of China Corporate Research at Fitch Ratings.翻译:惠誉国际评级中国企业研究总监朱芙表示：“2020-21年，龙头企业积极扩张，资本支出巨大，即使在当前疲软的价格下，他们也不愿意减少产能。”

($1 = 7.1364 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.1364 人民币）

item.title: 中国将蔚来汽车列入批准的汽车制造商名单 - 网站
item.description:
Electric vehicle maker Nio (9866.HK) has been added to a Chinese industry ministry database permitting companies to produce vehicles in the country, according to the ministry's website.翻译:据工信部网站称，电动汽车制造商蔚来汽车（9866.HK）已被添加到中国工信部数据库中，允许企业在中国生产汽车。

The website gave no details on whether or when a manufacturing licence was granted to Nio, which has since 2018 partnered with Anhui Jianghuai Automobile Group (JAC) to produce electric vehicles on a contract basis.翻译:该网站没有详细说明蔚来汽车是否或何时获得制造许可证。蔚来汽车自 2018 年以来一直与安徽江淮汽车集团 (JAC) 合作，以合同方式生产电动汽车。

Nio said in response to a Reuters query that it currently had no information to share.翻译:蔚来在回应路透社询问时表示，目前没有可分享的信息。

Receiving a manufacturing licence would clear some uncertainty over the impact on Nio of JAC's plans to sell some assets belonging to the two factories that make Nio EVs.翻译:获得制造许可证将消除江淮汽车计划出售属于生产蔚来电动汽车的两家工厂的部分资产对蔚来影响的一些不确定性。

The state-backed newspaper China Securities Journal in October reported JAC's (600418.SS) sale plans. Nio said at the time that such a sale would not affect its future production activities.翻译:国有报纸《中国证券报》十月份报道了江淮汽车（600418.SS）的出售计划。蔚来当时表示，此类出售不会影响其未来的生产活动。

Granting Nio a production licence also marks a shift for Chinese authorities, which have been cautious about approving new production amid overcapacity and a deepening price war that has pulled in over 40 brands.翻译:授予蔚来汽车生产许可证也标志着中国当局的转变，由于产能过剩和价格战不断加深，中国当局对批准新生产持谨慎态度，这场价格战已吸引了 40 多个品牌参与。

Tesla Inc (TSLA.O) had yet to win a regulatory nod to proceed with its Shanghai plant expansion plan, Reuters reported in June. U.S. luxury EV maker Lucid Group (LCID.O) has also been advised of the low likelihood for approval, sources have told Reuters.翻译:据路透社 6 月份报道，特斯拉公司(TSLA.O)尚未获得监管机构批准继续其上海工厂扩建计划。消息人士告诉路透社，美国豪华电动汽车制造商 Lucid Group (LCID.O)也被告知获得批准的可能性很低。

To produce and sell cars in China, automakers have to first obtain a permit from the state planner and then the industry ministry. The last EV maker to receive both permits was Shandong-headquartered EV maker Sinogold in May 2019.翻译:要在中国生产和销售汽车，汽车制造商必须首先获得国家规划部门的许可，然后获得工业部的许可。最后一家获得这两项许可证的电动汽车制造商是总部位于山东的电动汽车制造商中金公司，时间为 2019 年 5 月。

Nio ranked ninth in terms of EV sales in the first 10 months in China with 126,067 units, according to data from China Passenger Car Association.翻译:根据中国乘用车联席会的数据，蔚来汽车前 10 个月在中国的电动汽车销量为 126,067 辆，排名第九。

The company has been trying to improve profitability, as it trims its workforce and defers long-term investments to improve efficiency and reduce costs in the face of growing competition.翻译:面对日益激烈的竞争，该公司一直在努力提高盈利能力，通过裁员和推迟长期投资来提高效率和降低成本。

Reporting by Cui Zhuzhu, Zhang Yan and Brenda Goh; Editing by Emelia Sithole-Matarise翻译:崔珠珠、张岩、Brenda Goh报道；编辑：埃米莉亚·西托尔-马塔里斯

item.title: 特斯拉11月份中国制造电动汽车销量下降17.8%，创2022年12月以来最大跌幅
item.description:
Sales of U.S. automaker Tesla's (TSLA.O) China-made electric vehicles (EVs) skidded 17.8% in November from the same month a year earlier, to 82,432 cars, China Passenger Car Association (CPCA) data showed on Monday.翻译:中国乘用车协会 (CPCA) 周一的数据显示，美国汽车制造商特斯拉(TSLA.O)的中国制造电动汽车 (EV) 11 月份销量同比下滑 17.8%，至 82,432 辆。

That marked the biggest fall since December 2022 when Tesla's sales of China-made EVs fell 21% on the year as the U.S. automaker reduced output and cut prices to deal with rising inventories and weakening demand.翻译:这是自 2022 年 12 月以来的最大跌幅，当时特斯拉中国制造的电动汽车销量同比下降 21%，原因是这家美国汽车制造商减少产量并降价以应对库存增加和需求疲软。

Deliveries of China-made Model 3 and Model Y cars were however 14.3% higher than in October.翻译:然而，中国制造的 Model 3 和 Model Y 汽车的交付量比 10 月份增长了 14.3%。

Chinese rival BYD (002594.SZ), with its Dynasty and Ocean series of EVs and petrol-electric hybrid models, saw passenger vehicle deliveries set another record at 301,378 vehicles in November, up 0.09% from October and 31% from a year earlier.翻译:中国竞争对手比亚迪（002594.SZ）凭借其王朝和海洋系列电动汽车和油电混合动力车型，11月份乘用车交付量再创新高，达到301,378辆，环比增长0.09%，同比增长31%。

Tesla has been under pressure to fend off competition in the world's largest auto market, though CEO Elon Musk's charm offensive in China continues unabated.翻译:尽管首席执行官埃隆·马斯克在中国的魅力攻势有增无减，但特斯拉一直面临着抵御全球最大汽车市场竞争的压力。

Musk was among a small group of top U.S. executives who met with Chinese President Xi Jinping before a dinner event on the sidelines of the APEC summit in San Francisco in mid-November.翻译:11 月中旬，在旧金山 APEC 峰会期间举行的晚宴上，马斯克是一小群美国高管中与中国国家主席习近平会面的人之一。

Xi expressed his support for Tesla's development in China, the automaker said in a Weibo post. Musk, in response, said he appreciated the rapid development of China's new energy vehicle sector.翻译:特斯拉在微博中表示，习近平表达了对特斯拉在中国发展的支持。马斯克回应称，他对中国新能源汽车行业的快速发展表示赞赏。

A Tesla-triggered price war in China since the start of the year has roped in more than 40 brands but its share of the country's EV market dropped to 5.78% in October from 8.7% in September, Reuters' calculations based on CPCA data show, as EV sales reached a monthly record.翻译:路透社根据CPCA数据计算显示，年初以来特斯拉在中国引发的价格战已经吸引了40多个品牌，但其在中国电动汽车市场的份额从9月份的8.7%下降到10月份的5.78%，随着电动汽车销量创下月度纪录。

Since late October, Tesla has made five upward price adjustments in China where EV demand growth is slowing as consumers favour more affordable plug-in hybrids even with an ever-increasing range of battery-only vehicles.翻译:自10月下旬以来，特斯拉在中国已进行了五次价格上调。中国的电动汽车需求增长正在放缓，因为消费者青睐更实惠的插电式混合动力汽车，尽管纯电池汽车的种类不断增加。

Li Auto (2015.HK) last month said mass production and delivery of its first full EV are scheduled for February.翻译:理想汽车（2015.HK）上个月表示，其首款纯电动汽车计划于 2 月份量产和交付。

Smartphone maker Xiaomi (1810.HK) has also moved closer to EV production, with a unit of automaker BAIC Group (1958.HK) applying for regulatory approval to build two Xiaomi-branded cars.翻译:智能手机制造商小米（1810.HK）也向电动汽车生产迈进，汽车制造商北汽集团（1958.HK）旗下子公司正在申请监管部门批准生产两款小米品牌汽车。

Reporting by Qiaoyi Li, Zhang Yan and Brenda Goh; Editing by Bernadette Baum, Kirsten Donovan翻译:李巧仪、张岩、Brenda Goh 报道；责任编辑：伯纳黛特·鲍姆、克尔斯滕·多诺万

item.title: 白俄罗斯总统卢卡申科回国寻求加强双边关系
item.description:
Belarussian President Alexander Lukashenko met China's leader Xi Jinping in Beijing on Monday for the second time this year, with the diplomatically isolated leader talking up his country's economic ties to the Asian giant amid biting Western sanctions.翻译:白俄罗斯总统亚历山大·卢卡申科周一在北京会见了中国领导人习近平，这是今年第二次，这位在外交上孤立的领导人在西方严厉的制裁下谈论了白俄罗斯与这个亚洲巨人的经济关系。

The close ally of Russian President Vladimir Putin is on a "working visit" to the Chinese capital and was received by Xi at the Diaoyutai State Guesthouse for a "working lunch" and three hours of talks, according to Belarussian state media.翻译:据白俄罗斯官方媒体报道，俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔·普京的亲密盟友正在对中国首都进行“工作访问”，并在钓鱼台国宾馆受到习近平的接见，共进“工作午餐”并进行了三个小时的会谈。

Lukashenko, the president of Belarus since 1994, backed Russia's invasion of Ukraine in February 2022 by allowing Moscow to use its territory to launch the war, but is faced with a crippled economy that is heavily reliant on trade with Russia.翻译:卢卡申科自 1994 年起担任白俄罗斯总统，支持俄罗斯于 2022 年 2 月入侵乌克兰，允许莫斯科使用其领土发动战争，但卢卡申科面临着严重依赖与俄罗斯贸易的严重受损的经济。

"China is willing to continue to strengthen strategic cooperation with Belarus, promote practical cooperation and deepen bilateral relations," Xi told his guest, according to Chinese state news agency Xinhua.翻译:据中国国家通讯社新华社报道，习近平对客人表示：“中方愿同白俄罗斯继续加强战略合作，推进务实合作，深化双边关系。”

"The two sides should implement projects like the China-Belarus Industrial Park and promote more achievements in China-Belarus industrial cooperation," Xinhua reported Xi as saying.翻译:新华社报道习近平表示，“双方要落实好中白工业园等项目，推动中白工业合作取得更多成果。”

The world's second-largest economy was Belarus' seventh largest trading partner in 2021 and before the war in Ukraine, according U.N. Comtrade data. China was Belarus' second-largest import partner, but the Eastern European country bought around three-quarters less from China than it did from Russia.翻译:根据联合国商品贸易统计数据库 (UN Comtrade) 的数据，2021 年和乌克兰战争之前，世界第二大经济体是白俄罗斯的第七大贸易伙伴。中国是白俄罗斯的第二大进口伙伴，但这个东欧国家从中国购买的商品比从俄罗斯购买的商品少约四分之三。

Lukashenko highlighted the scope to grow his country's commercial ties with China, Belarussian state media said, and lauded the "more than 120" two-way visits made by Chinese and Belarussian parties since the leaders last met in March.翻译:白俄罗斯官方媒体称，卢卡申科强调了发展白俄罗斯与中国商业关系的范围，并赞扬自3月份两国领导人上次会晤以来，中国和白俄罗斯双方进行了“120多次”双向访问。

Quickening the pace of cooperation between China and Belarus was "the only issue" Lukashenko wished to discuss with Xi on this visit to the Chines capital, the report added.翻译:报道补充说，加快中白合作步伐是卢卡申科此次访问中国首都“唯一希望与习近平讨论的问题”。

Xi told Lukashenko that both countries should improve cross-border transport facilitation and promote economic and trade initiatives like the China-Belarus Industrial Park, as well as people-to-people exchanges, according to Xinhua.翻译:据新华社报道，习近平对卢卡申科表示，两国要改善跨境交通便利化，推动中白工业园等经贸项目和人文交流。

Belarus faces sanctions from the United States, European Union, Britain, Canada, the Netherlands, and a number of other countries over its support of Russia's invasion of Ukraine and longer standing issues surrounding political repression.翻译:白俄罗斯因支持俄罗斯入侵乌克兰以及围绕政治镇压的长期问题而面临美国、欧盟、英国、加拿大、荷兰和其他一些国家的制裁。

Lukashenko told Xi that the world would thank China for its efforts to bring countries into his flagship Belt and Road Initiative, "unlike Western countries that are trying to cut everything into pieces," Belarussian state media reported.翻译:据白俄罗斯官方媒体报道，卢卡申科告诉习近平，世界将感谢中国为将各国纳入其旗舰“一带一路”倡议所做的努力，“这与西方国家试图将一切分割成碎片的做法不同”。

Xi offered to enhance coordination and cooperation between China and Belarus in multilateral mechanisms such as the United Nations and the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation, the Xinhua report said.翻译:新华社报道称，习近平提出加强中白在联合国、上海合作组织等多边机制中的协调与合作。

"China and Belarus are important forces in the reform and construction of the global governance system," it quoted Xi as saying.翻译:习近平表示，“中白是全球治理体系改革和建设的重要力量”。
